DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to determine the efficacy of oral hyoscine butyl bromide versus diclofenac potassium on the pain scores during office hysteroscopy
DOC.brief_title: Oral Hyoscine Butyl Bromide Versus Diclofenac Potassium Before Office Hysteroscopy
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients that must perform a diagnostic hysteroscopy. 2. Acceptance to participate in the study. 3. Signed informed consent. 4. Not taking analgesics (acetaminophen, ibuprofen, mefenamic acid) before admission. 5. Absence of sedative use before admission 1. Hypersensitivity to drugs 2. refusal of the patient 3. Patients are pregnant.
